short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Now you can play Helix Jump directly in your Chrome Browser, ad-free and offline! play.gameograf.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Now you can play Helix Jump directly in your Chrome™ Browser, ad-free and offline! Enjoy this exciting and addictive game without needing an internet connection.

Helix Jump is perfect for fans of hyper-casual games. It's all about guiding a bouncing ball down through a twisting, spiraling tower while avoiding obstacles and gaps.

In Helix Jump, your goal is to carefully rotate the tower to allow the ball to descend through the open spaces, avoiding the red platforms that will cause you to lose the game. As you progress, the difficulty ramps up, with faster speeds and more complex levels. It’s easy to learn but hard to master, offering endless fun for all skill levels.

Instructions:

On your computer, use the arrow keys or mouse to rotate the helix tower and guide the ball down.
